blog.name: candanandphilnot
blog.title: Dip and Pip Trash
blog.description:
•°·•°·23·Non-Binary·They/Them·Writer·°•·°•
•°·I want to personally fight Dan and Phil·°•
Main: @enbybeegee

summary: Title: Phil and the Leather Tramp Chapter Four Rated: Teen+ Chapter Four Preview: “Hey.” Phil replied, “Was that Muse you were...
body:
Title: Phil and the Leather Tramp

Chapter Four

Rated: Teen+

Chapter Four Preview: “Hey.” Phil replied, “Was that Muse you were playing?“

Surprised Dan responded, “Um, yeah Citizen Erased. Muse is my favorite band.” Phil nodded but didn’t say anything else so Dan continued, “And in other news, in this segment of ‘Things you didn’t ask about but I’ll over share anyways,’ I know most of their songs.”

Phil let out a small laugh, “You could say they’re your muse.”

“Wow,” Dan said through a loud laugh.

“It sounded amazing by the way. Maybe you should go into Showbiz.”

With another obnoxious laugh Dan responded, “Okay I didn’t ask to be assaulted with horrible Muse puns.”

Read From The Beginning.

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: Monthly Follower Recs!
body:
Follower recommendations of August 2018.

Anonymous

ANTICHRIST (wattpad) - 1-800-LESTERS

Summary: “gay and psychotic; we’re enough to make god cry.”

in which a boy with a face like an angel and dreams like the devil meets satan in black denim who chainsmokes and hates the world

coming home (ao3) - waveydnp

Summary: phil gets home from christmas holiday and dan’s waiting.

Gone. (ao3) - PeachyDaniel

Summary: “And that was it, I didn’t look back. I was finally gone.“

got good taste in you (ao3) - keeplovinanyway

Summary: “Yes, I did have a nice Valentine’s Day, thanks for asking! Who was that, I lost your name, Mauree …? Yes, it- it was a really nice day.”

Dan’s voice sounds soft and smiley, and like he almost wants to say more, and Phil stands frozen listening to him. His skin thrums with something like possibility and pride.

halfway to somewhere (ao3) - confusednp

Summary: On a quiet night in, Phil thinks back on how lucky he is (aided by his favorite substance).

Learning to Love, (Again) (ao3) - wekingsandprettythings

Summary: Dan was made a single Dad when he was just 16. Nearly 11 year later, after putting his love life on hold, he meets another single and super hot dad. Somehow a sleepover for their kids leads to something neither of them expected.

Living is Easy with My Eyes Closed (ao3) - TheUKAmazingDan

Summary: Dan Howell liked pretty things and a pretty guy, but not the one who was interested in him. No, Dan was infatuated with someone he couldn’t have.

Made of Rainbows (ao3) - freckliephil

Summary:

Family. /ˈfam(ə)lē/.

  1. A group of people related to each other by blood or marriage.

spoiler: it’s a bit more complicated than that.

Morning Coffee (ao3) - knlalla

Summary: inspired by the lovely anon who sent me “I dreamed Dan posted an insta story of Phil drinking coffee in bed and he was laying on his shoulder and I kept trying to show people how cute it was but no one cared, and when I woke up I remembered that you would care, and I realized it was a dream and now I’m a tad disappointed in my subconscious for trolling me.”

Our Lives Don’t Collide (ao3) - 332Roses

Summary: Shit hits the fan when famous actor!Phil is caught smooching a boy in an alleyway. Only problem? He’s not out and what’s worse? The boy he was smooching was a journalist who set it all up to get a quick picture and now Phil is royally screwed. The only answer Phils management can come up with is a fake relationship to try and do damage control and famous actor!Dan is the perfect candidate.

Slow My Mind (ao3) - AmbroseRivers

Summary: It’s always been there. It isn’t a sexual thing, really…Dan just liked to have something in his mouth.

the beast you’ve made of me (ao3) - azurephil

Summary: Phil’s eccentric aunt lives hours away in the countryside and needs someone to house-sit while she goes on holiday during the summer. He expects it to be peaceful, albeit boring. Then he meets the gardener.

The Pianist Everyone Is Talking About… Is My Husband (ao3) - natigail

Summary: YouTuber pianist Daniel James Howell is thrown into mainstream media’s awareness with the release of his first album. Phil works at BBC Radio 1, who increasingly play Dan’s songs more and more often, and he couldn’t be prouder of his husband. However, no one knows that Dan and Phil are married as they have chosen to keep their relationship private.

By accident, Phil is thrust into his husband’s fandom when his colleagues learn that he likes the pianist. Phil isn’t sure how to tell everyone that he’s actually married to the guy everyone is either praising or swooning over.

The Secrets That We Hide (ao3) - medvin

Summary: Dan is the new kid in school. Phil is the quiet kid who is always doodling. What is Dan hiding and why is Phil always disappearing?

reblog.comment:
Follower recommendations of August 2018.

blog.name: dip-the-pip
blog.title: Procrastination Station
blog.description:
never take me seriously. just don’t.

19/bi

summary:
“He has an ENGLISH LANGUAGE DEGREE”
“Phil can’t tie his laces, I love that phils been given all of the tracing ones.” 
“Phil...
body:
“He has an ENGLISH LANGUAGE DEGREE”

“Phil can’t tie his laces, I love that phils been given all of the tracing ones.”

“Phil can’t do up his laces. That’s the thing about phil. Do you wanna know a phil-fact, he can’t tie his laces”

“You’ve killed me inside dozens of times” (insert cute little smile)

“I feel like you should go first, Phil, cause I think you need the most help surviving situations in life” (big ol’ smiley boye)

“You just got your fricken face shaved off by the tube, that is relevant to your life” (excuse me bitch you’re the one who got your face stuck in a tube door)

“YOU need a bit of that bug removal”

“Stretch meeee, stretch meeee, imagine if someone did that to dan and phil”

“I am a long boye, that’s what dan and phil look like live.”

“I’d like to go on a chalet holiday”

“Hold that sneeze. Orgasm denial”

“Oooh he’s a little salmon tapper, he loves to tap that salmon”

“You just got slapped, IDIOT”

“Please….delete phil”

“Kylie Jenner is QUAKING”

“It’s the finger of truth phil, and you need to deal with it”

“Dunno where my hands been, wouldn’t bite it if I were you”

“No heavy petting. Furries are not allowed in the pool. Light pettings okay.”

“You need to rub it faster”

“Frickity FRACK, oh my god, I don’t wanna be a snack”

“COMMUTING”

*heavy sigh* “You know what, because I’m a good friend, you can have it, phil!”


Why do we let dan speak sometimes

trail.content_raw:
“He has an ENGLISH LANGUAGE DEGREE”

“Phil can’t tie his laces, I love that phils been given all of the tracing ones.”

“Phil can’t do up his laces. That’s the thing about phil. Do you wanna know a phil-fact, he can’t tie his laces”

“You’ve killed me inside dozens of times” (insert cute little smile)

“I feel like you should go first, Phil, cause I think you need the most help surviving situations in life” (big ol’ smiley boye)

“You just got your fricken face shaved off by the tube, that is relevant to your life” (excuse me bitch you’re the one who got your face stuck in a tube door)

“YOU need a bit of that bug removal”

“Stretch meeee, stretch meeee, imagine if someone did that to dan and phil”

“I am a long boye, that’s what dan and phil look like live.”

“I’d like to go on a chalet holiday”

“Hold that sneeze. Orgasm denial”

“Oooh he’s a little salmon tapper, he loves to tap that salmon”

“You just got slapped, IDIOT”

“Please….delete phil”

“Kylie Jenner is QUAKING”

“It’s the finger of truth phil, and you need to deal with it”

“Dunno where my hands been, wouldn’t bite it if I were you”

“No heavy petting. Furries are not allowed in the pool. Light pettings okay.”

“You need to rub it faster”

“Frickity FRACK, oh my god, I don’t wanna be a snack”

“COMMUTING”

*heavy sigh* “You know what, because I’m a good friend, you can have it, phil!”


Why do we let dan speak sometimes
trail.content:
“He has an ENGLISH LANGUAGE DEGREE”

“Phil can’t tie his laces, I love that phils been given all of the tracing ones.”

“Phil can’t do up his laces. That’s the thing about phil. Do you wanna know a phil-fact, he can’t tie his laces”

“Stretch meeee, stretch meeee, imagine if someone did that to dan and phil”

“I am a long boye, that’s what dan and phil look like live.”

“I’d like to go on a chalet holiday”

“Hold that sneeze. Orgasm denial”

“It’s the finger of truth phil, and you need to deal with it”
